Configuration Changes.title: Removed MODE Environment Variable
Configuration Changes.motivation: Simplify setup and remove redundant configuration.
Configuration Changes.public_explanation: The environment variables were streamlined for easier setup and to avoid confusion.
Configuration Changes.developer_explanation: Vite already determines the mode automatically via the CLI. Explicit declaration is unnecessary.

Dependency and Tooling Updates.title: Rolled Back Excalidraw NPM Package Version
Dependency and Tooling Updates.motivation: Ensure project stability after regressions in newer versions.
Dependency and Tooling Updates.public_explanation: A temporary rollback to a more stable version to ensure functionality.
Dependency and Tooling Updates.developer_explanation: The newer version introduced regressions or incompatibilities. Reverting ensures reliability.

Dependency and Tooling Updates.title: Added Yarnrc to Use Node Modules
Dependency and Tooling Updates.motivation: Improve compatibility with existing tooling and editors.
Dependency and Tooling Updates.public_explanation: Improves compatibility with tooling and IDEs.
Dependency and Tooling Updates.developer_explanation: Switches from Plug’n’Play (PnP) to node_modules resolution for better compatibility.

Removals and Deprecations.title: Removed Internal AI Coding Guidelines
Removals and Deprecations.motivation: Avoid confusion with outdated or unused documentation.
Removals and Deprecations.public_explanation: Internal AI coding guidelines were removed from the repo to simplify contribution docs.
Removals and Deprecations.developer_explanation: No longer reflects the dev team’s workflow. Centralized documentation is preferred.

Removals and Deprecations.title: Removed CLAUDE.md Developer Guide
Removals and Deprecations.motivation: Deprecated internal documentation removed to reduce clutter.
Removals and Deprecations.public_explanation: Deprecated internal documentation has been removed to reduce clutter.
Removals and Deprecations.developer_explanation: Contents are outdated and replaced by dev-docs.

Documentation Updates.title: captureUpdate Renamed to commitToStore
Documentation Updates.motivation: Simplify API and reduce internal coupling.
Documentation Updates.public_explanation: The prop controlling history tracking has been renamed for clarity.
Documentation Updates.developer_explanation: Replaced enum-based configuration with a simpler boolean flag.
